name: Calgary Canadian Immigrant Newcomer Fair
location: Calgary TELUS Convention Centre, Calgary, AB
details: An event designed to assist immigrants in Calgary with resources and information to aid their settlement and integration.

name: Centre for Newcomers / Calgary Stampede Hiring Event
details: A hiring event in collaboration with the Calgary Stampede, offering job opportunities for newcomers.

name: Lessons Learned: Newcomers Growing Tech Businesses in Canada
details: A session sharing experiences and insights from newcomers who have established tech businesses in Canada.

name: Yoga at the Park for Newcomers to Canada
details: A series of yoga sessions aimed at helping newcomers to Canada relax and integrate into the community.

name: Your Career: Driving Positive Impact
details: A workshop focused on guiding newcomers to drive positive impact in their careers within Canada.

name: Edmonton Newcomers Club Monthly Meeting
details: A monthly gathering for newcomers to Edmonton to network, share experiences, and learn about local resources.

name: Red Deer Immigrant Centre Orientation Session
details: An orientation session providing essential information and resources for newcomers settling in Red Deer.

name: Lethbridge Family Services Newcomer Workshop
details: A workshop aimed at assisting newcomer families in Lethbridge with settlement services and community integration.

name: Fort McMurray Multicultural Association Cultural Exchange
details: An event promoting cultural exchange and understanding among newcomers and the local community in Fort McMurray.

name: Grande Prairie Newcomers Networking Evening
details: A networking evening for newcomers in Grande Prairie to connect with local professionals and community members.

name: Brooks Immigrant Support Group Meet & Greet
details: A meet-and-greet event where newcomers to Brooks can connect with local support services and other immigrants.

name: Medicine Hat Welcoming Community Event
details: An event designed to welcome newcomers to Medicine Hat, offering resources and information on community services.

name: Airdrie Multicultural Centre Open House
details: An open house event at the Airdrie Multicultural Centre to introduce newcomers to local resources and community support.

name: St. Albert Newcomer Integration Workshop
details: A workshop in St. Albert focused on helping newcomers understand local services, employment resources, and integration programs.

name: Okotoks Community Connection Event for Newcomers
details: A community connection event providing newcomers with information on local services, employment, and social connections in Okotoks.

name: Lloydminster Cultural Diversity Night
details: An evening event celebrating cultural diversity, aimed at helping newcomers in Lloydminster feel welcome and connected.

name: Camrose Newcomer Resource Fair
details: A resource fair in Camrose for newcomers to learn about community services, employment support, and cultural integration.

name: Strathmore New Residents Orientation
details: An orientation event to introduce new residents of Strathmore to local services, education, and employment opportunities.

name: High River Welcome Evening for Newcomers
details: A welcome evening for newcomers to High River, featuring information on local services and community support.

name: Lacombe Immigrant Information Session
details: An informational session for immigrants to learn about resources available in Lacombe, including language support and employment.

name: Wetaskiwin Newcomer Meet and Greet
details: An event where newcomers to Wetaskiwin can connect with local community leaders and learn about available services.

name: Spruce Grove New Resident Orientation
details: An orientation session for new residents of Spruce Grove, providing insights into local amenities and support networks.

name: Chestermere Cultural Connections Night
details: An event promoting cultural exchange and understanding, designed to help newcomers feel connected to the Chestermere community.

name: Beaumont Family Resource Centre Newcomers' Workshop
details: A workshop hosted by the Family Resource Centre to provide information on family support and settlement services for newcomers.

name: Banff Newcomer Welcome Tour
details: A guided tour and welcome session for newcomers to Banff, covering key resources and community information.

name: Canmore Newcomer Social Night
details: A social night aimed at helping newcomers to Canmore connect with locals and learn about community services.

name: Morinville Community Orientation for Newcomers
details: A community orientation session to help new residents of Morinville access local resources and support networks.

name: Hinton Welcome Gathering for New Canadians
details: A welcome gathering for new Canadians in Hinton, offering information on settlement services and community resources.

name: Debo Dam Home for Gifted Kids
details: A welcome gathering for new Canadians in Calgary, offering information on settlement services and community resources.

name: Adeeb & Friends: Bhabi Night 2
details: A nice, fun game time
